info.name: TweetDeck EBG
info.description:
This is my attempt to correct some of the problems I experienced with TD, while improving its design a bit. More info below.
This style is compatible with both "Dark" and "Light" TD themes.
info.additionalInfo:
• Adaptative column width (fill available space)
  • Tweet actions are auto-hidden (visible on hover) Update: actions are no longer hidden in the modal view
  • Improved modal image viewer (taller image, auto-hidden tweet)
  • Round avatars (square on hover)
  • Some minor style tweaks inspired from TweetDeck Material
